text: Lycaena pavana, the white-bordered copper, is a small butterfly found in India that belongs to the lycaenids or blues family. left ==See also== *List of butterflies of India *List of butterflies of India (Lycaenidae) ==References== * * * * * pavana Category:Butterflies of India Category:Taxa named by Vincenz Kollar Category:Butterflies described in 1848
title: Lycaena pavana
